Items.Title: Oversight - HIV/AIDS Services Administration
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to processing of applications for non-emergency housing for clients of the HIV and AIDS Services Administration.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Processing of applications for permanent housing for clients of the HIV and AIDS Services Administration.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the reporting requirements for the division of AIDS services or its functional or legal equivalent.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reporting requirements for the division of AIDS services or its functional or legal equivalent.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the creation of a central housing referral system to track clients of the HIV and AIDS Services Administration.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creation of a central housing referral system to track clients of the HIV and AIDS Services Administration.

Items.Title: Oversight - HIV/AIDS Services Administration
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to processing of applications for non-emergency housing for clients of the HIV and AIDS Services Administration.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Processing of applications for permanent housing for clients of the HIV and AIDS Services Administration.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the reporting requirements for the division of AIDS services or its functional or legal equivalent.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reporting requirements for the division of AIDS services or its functional or legal equivalent.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the creation of a central housing referral system to track clients of the HIV and AIDS Services Administration.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creation of a central housing referral system to track clients of the HIV and AIDS Services Administration.
